Description: Limestone stela decorated in relief with a stylised ankh within a wreath; red detail.
Bibliographic references: Badawy 1978 / Coptic art and archaeology (3.214, p.220)
Brunton 1930 / Qau and Badari III (pl. LVII, no.2)
Tudor 2011 / Christian Funerary Stelae of the Byzantine and Arab Periods from Egypt
Acquisition name: Purchased from: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
